lexUnit.name: query.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: ask a query about something, or put a query or queries to.

sentence.text: ` Mm , deserved that , did n't I ? " he queried almost gently , and Hilary stared at him in astonishment .
` At a loose end , Deveraugh ? " she queried disdainfully as he followed her out of the tent .
Glancing at him , she queried helplessly , ` Do you ever have days when you wish you 'd stayed in bed ? "
` So , " Leith swallowed down at least four contradictions she could have lobbed at him , and queried sarcastically instead , ` what would you like to talk about ? "
Perhaps something in her face alerted him because he stopped , then queried slowly , thoughtfully , ` Or do you ? "
Her lovely face reflecting her complete and utter bewilderment , she queried slowly , ` Why on earth would I want to claim kinship ? "
` Is that your dinner piece ? " queried Natasha , pointing at the waxed paper parcel Maggie was holding .
` Number ? " queried Sean .
` How about writing to her ? " queried George .
What are we doing here ? " queried Connors .
` What do you know of this , Doctor ? " queried Fakrid .
` Twelve and a half minutes ? " queried Misch , taken aback by the exactitude of the estimate .
` Grapes , Aunt Edie ? " queried Jimmy .
` Smoking ? " queried the doctor .
" Why not ? " queried Eva .
` Why do they all wear yellow ? " queried Isabel , noticing the bright clothing along the entire length of the street .
` You really do n't mind , do you ? " queried Lindsey .
` If they found a point they wished to query us on we had to give an instant , pressurised response , " he said .
` Shingle Street ? " queried the lady at the Public Record Office .
Tentatively , he put the recovery at about 18 months ahead , but queried if it could be a non-inflationary one .
` His what ? " she queried in astonishment .
And what will you be doing ? " she queried in amusement .
` The weapon ? " the Doctor queried absently .
` You are unhurt ? " she queried anxiously .
` Is anything wrong ? " he queried , and Belinda realised that she had been staring at him in silence for far too long , as she tried to decide what to say .
` You know that , do you ? " he queried .
` You found my kiss chastening ? " he queried gently .
` Has n't my friend collected her gear yet ? " she queried .
` What sort of things do you teach ? " she queried .
` Marissa ? " he queried blankly .
Curious to know how strong the ties were , Luce queried , ` Do you visit Italy often ? "
` Getting to you , is it , Aurora ? " he queried softly .
` For a thief ? " she queried sourly , wishing she 'd kept quiet about it .
` Do your parents know Thomas is mine ? " he queried .
` You type , of course ? " he queried conversationally , and suddenly Fabia felt panic hit the pit of her stomach .
` Did he know them ? " queried Coffin sharply .
